glosses: Derives intransitive verbs from names of colors.

examples.text: kara (“black”) + -ar → kararmak (“to turn black, to darken”)
ak (“white, light”) + -ar → ağarmak (“to turn white, to whiten”)
mor (“purple”) + -ar → morarmak (“to turn purple, to bruise”)
ön (“front, ahead”) + -er → önermek (“to put forward, to propose”)

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish ـر (-r, -er, -ar), from Proto-Turkic *-gar.
